reviews.text: I made an unscheduled stop-over in Kavala and found the town and the Lucy Hotel an unexpectedly pleasant surprise. Friendly staff, comfortable rooms, and a nice clean beach nearby.
reviews.title: Excellent hotel

reviews.text: We visited Kavala for just one day. On the way in we saw that in the same hotel a famous greek singer would stay (Natasha Theodoridou) and we're thrilled about it. The hotel room was spacious and the amenities were great. The only problem were the mosquitos that ruined our afternoon when we wanted to rest for a while. Lucy hotel has a great beach in front of it, that is worthwhile trying it. It was a good experience after all. A 4 star hotel.
reviews.title: Maybe the best hotel of the town.

reviews.text: WE STAYED THERE FOR A WEEK AND HAD A WHALE OF A TIME! THE SERVICE WAS Excellent, the staff really helpful and willing to help. The room was really nice, spacious ( I stayed there with my husband and three children and had plenty of free space around us ) and beautifully decorated.The view from the room was magnificent( OPENING THE CURTAINS, YOU COULD SEE THE SEA OPPOSITE EVEN WHEN ON YOUR BED). The location was very convenient, There was a supermarket near. I really enjoyed the room as it was so clean ( IT WAS CLEANED TWICE A DAY ). My children liked the chocolate that was waiting for them on their pillow after the afternoon tidying of the room. THANK YOU FOR THE NICE ACCOMODATION THAT YOU OFFERED TO US!
reviews.title: It was perfect!! I strongly reccomend it!!!

reviews.text: We stayed 6 nights and 7 days. Breakfasts were plentiful and the rooms and common areas are well appointed. It resembles a Sofitel in some ways -- cool, modern furniture. It is probably the best hotel in Kavala. They are clearly going after a business clientele but we were comfortable there as a family. The beach is very disappointing -- they haven't worked out a system to protect locals from using their chairs, everyone is smoking, and the beach has trash. You can drive 5 minutes though to "private" beach clubs -- e.g., Batis, Tosca, etc. -- and for 5 Euros have a much better experience.
